response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize your operations and enhance efficiency. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it could significantly impact your business positively. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment for your business. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable asset to your company. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 15000}
